tool_description: The 'Find By PostCode' API retrieves addresses for a specified UK postcode. It utilizes the latest PAF and Multiple Residence data from Royal Mail to provide accurate address information.

api_list.name: Find By PostCode
api_list.description: This API allows users to search for UK addresses based on a given postcode.

required_parameters.name: postcode
required_parameters.description: The UK postcode for which addresses are to be retrieved.
